channel.title: And on Superdanby
channel.description: Recent content in And on Superdanby

item.title: Data Operations
item.description: Logic Operations Example: 23, 11 Shift Operations Example: 15, -15 Questions Let X and Y be 39 and 127 respectively. Both are 8-bit unsigned numbers. Apply 1-bit logical/arithmetic left/right shift on X and Y. Show the process in binary format. Apply NOT, AND, NAND, OR, NOR, XOR, and XNOR on X and Y. Show the process in binary format. Show the results of problem 1.
